mapper.select: SELECT subject_code as id , subject_name as name FROM dict_subject

SELECT variety_code as id, variety_name as name FROM common_medicine_variety
limit 0,#{limit}

SELECT si.spec_id, si.NAME, si.head_portrait, si.employment_age, si.expertise_field, IFNULL( sis.interact_count, 0 ) AS interact_count , count(cf.id) as follow , 0 as is_follow, '' as sub, '' as cat FROM spec_info si LEFT JOIN spec_interact_stats sis ON si.spec_id = sis.spec_id LEFT JOIN common_follow cf ON si.spec_id = cf.object_id and cf.object_type = '1' and cf.follow_flag = '1'
LEFT JOIN spec_subject_rel ssr ON si.spec_id = ssr.spec_id
LEFT JOIN spec_cat_rel scr ON si.spec_id = scr.spec_id
WHERE 1=1
AND ssr.subject_id = #{subject_code}
AND scr.cat_id = #{cat_code}
AND si.name LIKE '%'|| #{name} ||'%'
group by(si.spec_id) ORDER BY si.employment_age DESC
select object_id from common_follow where follow_user_id = #{user_id} and follow_flag = '1' and object_type = '0'

SELECT si.*, IFNULL( sis.interact_count, 0 ) AS interact_count, count( cf.id ) AS follow, 0 AS is_follow , '' as sub, '' as cat FROM spec_info si LEFT JOIN spec_interact_stats sis ON si.spec_id = sis.spec_id LEFT JOIN common_follow cf ON si.spec_id = cf.object_id AND cf.object_type = '1' AND cf.follow_flag = '1' WHERE si.spec_id = #{spec_id}
select IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(ds.subject_name),'') as sub from spec_subject_rel ssr left join dict_subject ds on ssr.subject_id = ds.subject_code where ssr.spec_id = #{spec_id}
SELECT IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(cmv.variety_name),'') as cat from spec_cat_rel scr left join common_medicine_variety cmv on scr.cat_id = cmv.variety_code where scr.spec_id = #{spec_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE spec_article SET is_audit = 3 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.title,a.author,a.spec_id,b.name,concat(concat(b.name,"("),b.telephone,")") as name_tel,a.publish_time,a.article_type,b.telephone,a.img_url,a.content from spec_article a left join common_user b on a.spec_id = b.id where a.id = #{id}

SELECT sc.id, sc.title, si.img_url, sc.publish_time FROM spec_case sc LEFT JOIN spec_issue si ON sc.issue_id = si.id LEFT JOIN spec_issue_association sia ON sia.issueid = si.id WHERE sia.specid = #{spec_id}

SELECT sc.id, sc.title, sc.content, sc.publish_time, sc.issue_id, si.issue_desc, si.img_url, si.video_url, si.issue_time, si.issue_address, si.issue_user_id FROM spec_case sc LEFT JOIN spec_issue si ON sc.issue_id = si.id WHERE sc.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into spec_issue_association (specid, issueid, is_assigned) values
(#{item.specid},#{item.issueid},#{item.is_assigned})
mapper.select: SELECT si.id, si.issue_desc, sia.is_assigned, sif.name, sif.head_portrait FROM spec_issue si LEFT JOIN spec_issue_association sia ON si.id = sia.issueid LEFT JOIN spec_info sif ON sia.specid = sif.spec_id WHERE si.issue_user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT si.id, si.issue_desc, si.img_url, si.video_url, si.issue_time, si.issue_address, si.follow_days, cmv.variety_name, ds.subject_name, si.field_ids, (CASE si.issue_status WHEN 0 THEN '未处理' WHEN 1 THEN '进行中' WHEN 2 THEN '已解决' WHEN 3 THEN '已关闭' END ) status,
cu.name, cu.head_portrait, cu.telephone FROM spec_issue si LEFT JOIN common_user cu ON si.issue_user_id = cu.id Left join dict_subject ds ON si.sub_code = ds.subject_code left join common_medicine_variety cmv ON cmv.variety_code = si.cat_code WHERE si.id = #{issue_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spec_upload_file ( title, spec_id, file_size, file_url, upload_time, status ) VALUE ( #{title},#{spec_id},#{file_size},#{file_url},#{upload_time},#{status} )
mapper.update: update spec_upload_file SET status = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
